The Effect of Videogames on Society

Books

We've handpicked the best, most well-researched books to give you a thorough understanding of the topic. Our publications have passed strict Meowing Dolphins tests for content, authority, and currency.

Articles

Here at the Meowing Dolphins, we value the importance of peer-reviewed research articles as boring as they are. Many hours of laborious work have resulted in a set of high-quality articles which you will be sure to find interesting.

APA referencing

All of our resources are referenced in the APA style for your convenience, following the Monash University Library guidelines. We're ready and waiting for your next big report.

About

The Meowing Dolphins were established in early 2015 as a group of fine procrastinators and resource-gatherers.
